body: @peterstnt He is the same artist yes, and I do plan to translate those too if possible

@nhcasual the artirst Negoya has 2 series Kurowaria and Rintofaru with similar pacing and art, so similar i think it might even be the same guy as this one, if you like them it would be nice to see a translation thanks!
Lol, was the guy at the end a kid too?

Yes I understand if many people don't like this series, no penetration, NTR, dumb FMC, lots of legit criticism, this is more of a niche for weirdos like me who are into these types of slow burn teasing NTRs, I am currently working on the next chap
3 pages in and I knew this was garbage
